scripts.build-js: uglifyjs --output app/app.main.min.js -- app/structure.js app/personalInformation.service.js app/about/skillbar.component.js app/about/about.component.js app/projects/blurb.component.js app/projects/project.component.js app/navigation.component.js app/logo.component.js app/home/home.component.js app/app.component.js app/app.routes.js app/app.module.js app/main.js
